Unusual external connection attempts tar.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for external source IPs attempting connections to internal IPs on sensitive ports (e.g., 22, 3389, database ports). Monitor Windows Event ID 4625 on systems hosting these services for correlated failed login attempts. Identify high frequency attempts from specific IPs or blocks. Use correlation analysis to identify source IPs targeting multiple sensitive services.

External network connections or process.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek http.log, Windows Event ID 4688
External network connections or process.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections from internal hosts/endpoints to suspicious external destinations following the receipt of targeted external communications. Analyze Windows Event ID 4688 for unusual child processes spawned by common user applications (e.g., email client, browser) that connect externally. Use time series analysis or behavioral profiling to identify deviations from normal communication patterns.
